text: The women's javelin throw event at the 1970 Summer Universiade was held at the Stadio Comunale in Turin with the final on 5 September 1970. ==Records== {| class="wikitable" width=65% |- !colspan="5"|Standing records prior to the 1970 Summer Universiade |- |World record | |62.40 |Tokyo, Japan |16 October 1964 |- |Universiade record | |59.22 |Budapest, Hungary |August 1965 |} ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !
